title: Mirrored Synced Tabs
content: Strange glitch has been occurring with my phone and laptop. I pull up synced tabs on my phone to see what's open on my laptop, it appears normally. However, when I open synced tabs on my laptop to see what open on my phone, I get tabs that haven't been open and were closed days to a week ago. And now, it displays two different sets of synced tabs (as seen below). It's a strange quirk I'm not confident how to fix. Any ideas?
creator: alxpaz8

title: Problem with every website I try to visit with Firefox
content:
Every website I try to visit with Firefox produces a page which reads "Suspected Phishing." And when I click on "Ignore and proceed" I am taken to a blank webpage. Each web address in the URL field reads "SmartDirect.de." Firefox has thus, for me, become a useless browser.

Is there anything I can do to fix this problem with Firefox? In answering my question please bear in mind I do not have a PhD from MIT and am not an expert in computer science.
creator: gymmo

title: Facebook auto refresh problem
content:
Using Firefox 115 desktop. How do I stop my facebook news feed from automatically reloading? Nothing I have tried seems to work. There is no setting in facebook for this, and I have the About:Config blockautorefresh set to true.

Viewing my facebook newsfeed, if I leave the tab to check something, when I come back, facebook seems to force an auto refresh on the page and I lose my spot.

How do I stop this behavior?
creator: Murby

title: making sure sight is secure

title: Firefox losses connection to internet, then refuses to shut down requiring a restart.
content:
Every once in a while a tab will be stuck a page, once this happens all other pages will behave the same way. When I try to close out firefox the icon remains open , but other programs will close as normal. The only way to fix this is hard restarting my PC.


I've had issues with bad Ram in the past, but those causes constant crashes while here there have been none.
creator: chriskaiser168
